title: macbook air 820-01521-02 just back light no lcd display
message: 820-01521-02 no water damage...i was check under microscope for damage but all look good...there is backlight ,the fan work, no Chime..but there is sound when i connect and disconnect the charger...so i think its work...just no picture..any idea where to start?

title: macbook air 820-01521-02 just back light no lcd display
message:
USB activity?
[url]http://www.cmizapper.com/products/usb-tester.html[/url]
This is the best tester...

Did you check external video?

title: macbook air 820-01521-02 just back light no lcd display
message: I have usb checker....i get 5v for 3 sec and then 20v stable, the external look good

title: macbook air 820-01521-02 just back light no lcd display
message: If you have external video, then try known good full LCD assembly.

title: macbook air 820-01521-02 just back light no lcd display
